item.title: Why is it Hard to Draw with a Mouse and What Can You Do About It?
item.description: Why is it Hard to Draw with a Mouse and What Can You Do About It? Were you a big-time whiteboard user before the work-from-home era? And now, do you just talk and gesture in Zoom meetings instead of using an online whiteboard? If so, you are not aloneâ€”many don’t even bother because they feel it is too difficult. Have you ever wondered why? To start things off, here is a personal story some might relate to.
